body_html:
for those who find this with a google search - this is the solution I found that worked at getting matplotlib errors to go away even with jupyter notebooks: http://blog.rousek.name/2015/11/29/adventure-with-matplotlib-virtualenv-and-macosx/

I hope this doesn't reopen the ticket.
